definition: first choice/premium/to come first in the imperial examinations
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc

sentences.english: Meditation can help, and should be your first choice before medication.
sentences.chinese: 沉思能帮助你并应该是你就医前的首选。

sentences.english: It is a preferred addictive for preparing over-based marine cylinder oil.
sentences.chinese: 是调制高碱值船用汽缸油的首选添加剂。

sentences.english: Optic fiber is now the preferred transmission medium for long-haul trunks.
sentences.chinese: 光纤已是长途干线的首选传输媒质。

sentences.english: The method of first selection is compensatory population illuminant .
sentences.chinese: 首选的办法是补充人口光源。

sentences.english: No wonder the banana is the number one fruit with the world\\\'s leading athletes.
sentences.chinese: 怪不得香蕉能够成为世界顶级运动员的首选水果。

sentences.english: This tonic, strengthening the loins and invigorating the kidney , is the first choice for the nephrotics.
sentences.chinese: 本补膏健肾壮腰，肾亏病人的首选补品。

sentences.english: Knowledge of production planning and ERP system is preferred.
sentences.chinese: 精通生产规划和ERP系统是首选。

sentences.english: The profiling method is the preferred way to measure remote sensing reflectance.
sentences.chinese: 光学剖面法是测量遥感反射率的首选方法。

sentences.english: Transsphenoidal surgery is currently the primary therapeutic option for Cushing s disease.
sentences.chinese: 一旦明确库欣病的诊断，经蝶窦手术是首选治疗方法。

sentences.english: Conclusion Microwave therapy is the first treatment to primary verruca vulgaris of hand.
sentences.chinese: 结论手部较大寻常疣应首选微波治疗。

sentences.english: Conclusion Surgical resection is the first choice of the treatment for verrucous nevus.
sentences.chinese: 结论手术切除为疣状痣的首选治疗方法。

sentences.english: Creating a new broad-spectrum resistant variety has become the goal of potato breeders.
sentences.chinese: 因此，培育广谱抗病新品种是育种学家的首选目标。

sentences.english: Becoming customers' top choice for Intelligent IT Platform solutions, especially for Small and Medium size Business (SMB).
sentences.chinese: 成为客户首选的智能信息产品与解决方案提供商。

sentences.english: Side to side anastomosis is preferred to build anatomical snuffbox arteriovenous fistula.
sentences.chinese: 侧侧吻合术式可作为鼻烟窝内瘘首选术式。

sentences.english: The third preference is for the sender email address.
sentences.chinese: 第三个首选项是发送者电子邮件地址。

sentences.english: Therefore the sonography should be the first choice for the diagnosis of NLM.
sentences.chinese: 那这会成为糖尿病人临床治疗的首选吗？

definition: current favorite/the latest thing/darling (of the market or the media etc)
to regard as the foremost/to name as a prime example/to implement for the first time
one of (sth)/one out of a multitude/one (third, quarter, percent etc)
to treasure/to be very fond of
(lit.) to fix one's gaze on/(fig.) to show interest in/(favorable) attention/favor
of the utmost importance/of highest priority
see 必不可少[bi4 bu4 ke3 shao3]
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
